summary: Comprehensive testing of GreenForge OS MVP completed successfully. All backend APIs working correctly, frontend loading and functioning properly, all major features tested successfully including authentication, CRUD operations, and public pages.

warnings: Some React hooks warnings in console (useEffect missing dependencies) - non-critical

design_issues.issue: Minor dialog accessibility warnings in console

fixed_issues.issue: CSS compilation error with font-body class
fixed_issues.fix: Updated index.css to use direct font-family instead of Tailwind utility class

passed_tests: Backend API health check - 26/26 endpoints working
Dashboard loading with stats cards - working
Inventory page - add/edit plant functionality working
CRM page - add/edit lead functionality working
Store page - public access, product display, search and filtering working
Courses page - public access, course display, level filtering working
Landing page - all sections loading (hero, stats, features, CTA)
